SINT_Prompt_Task.Objective: Run a conflict-oriented debate to evaluate trade-offs between accelerated yield gains and biosafety/acceptance constraints for region-wide deployment of gene-edited staple crops. Require detailed positions, numeric ratings (1-10), cross-critique, and iterative convergence.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Context: 1. Regulatory approvals, containment protocols, labeling/traceability. 2. Agronomic constraints across smallholder vs. industrial scales. 3. English-only output; PCG grounding required. 4. Divergence Ratings and compromise proposals across rounds. 5. Dual Output + Verification Report are mandatory.

Consultants.Agent: Approval pathways, risk classification, public safeguards.

SINT_Prompt_Task.Methodology: Debates (N=3) with Step 3A (Conflict), at least 2 rounds with Divergence Ratings and compromise synthesis.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Finalization_Protocol: 1. Require ratings (1-10), cross-evaluation each round, explicit compromises. 2. Strict XML-only formatting; no leading spaces or HTML entities. 3. Enforce PCG; mark INVALID and self-correct if ungrounded. 4. MSV: stop and request clarification on contradictions/impossibilities. 5. Dual Output + Verification Report required.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Verification: Checks: pcg_compliance, xml_validity, objective_match, no_undeclared_assumptions; meta: consensus_score, iterations_used, fallback_flag.
